# Kalja 
Kalja is a improvisation punk band based in VALIMO part of Helsinki, Finland.

## Essential Links
- Official Website: https://kalja.band
- Music on Bandcamp: https://kaljapunkki.bandcamp.com/ 
- Updates on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kalja.band/ 

## About the Band
Members: KaljaT, KaljaS
